trans-unit.source: Returns data from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna dados a partir de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An instance of SpeakProgressEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de SpeakProgressEventArgs é criada quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objeto gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera esse evento para cada nova palavra que ele está disponível em um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The returned data is based on the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) that the code generates.
trans-unit.target: Os dados retornados são baseados na fala síntese marcação idioma (SSML) que gera o código.

trans-unit.source: The values returned for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A> include spaces and the characters and contents of the SSML tags generated by the code.
trans-unit.target: Os valores retornados para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A>incluir espaços e caracteres e o conteúdo das marcas SSML gerados pelo código.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position of the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição de áudio do evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliza números com as palavras que correspondem aos como o número será falado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o sintetizador fala o número "4003" como "quatro mil três".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words, and returns the AudioPosition for each word.
trans-unit.target: Ele gera um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>evento para cada uma das palavras faladas e retorna o AudioPosition para cada palavra.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the event in the audio output stream.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição do evento no fluxo de saída de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de caracteres na palavra que foi falada antes que o evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliza números com as palavras que correspondem aos como o número será falado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o sintetizador fala o número "4003" como "quatro mil três".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Ele gera um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>evento para cada uma das palavras faladas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: However, the CharacterCount property for each of the three words is the same.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a propriedade CharacterCount para cada uma das três palavras é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: It is the count of the characters in the number “4003” in the text of the prompt, in this case, four.
trans-unit.target: É a contagem de caracteres no número "4003" no texto do aviso, nesse caso, quatro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de caracteres na palavra que foi falada antes que o evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de caracteres e espaços desde o início do prompt para a posição antes da primeira letra da palavra que acabou de ser falada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de caracteres e espaços desde o início do prompt para a posição antes da primeira letra da palavra que acabou de ser falada.

trans-unit.source: The text that was just spoken when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: O texto que foi falado apenas quando o evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliza números com as palavras que correspondem aos como o número será falado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o sintetizador fala o número "4003" como "quatro mil três".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Ele gera um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>evento para cada uma das palavras faladas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: However, the Text property for each of the three words is the same.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a propriedade de texto para cada um dos três palavras é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: It is the text “4003” from the prompt.
trans-unit.target: É o texto "4003" no prompt de.

trans-unit.source: Returns the text that was just spoken when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o texto que foi falado apenas quando o evento foi gerado.
